settings.title: Save 25% on All Dave White Artworks – Limited Time Offer!
settings.text:
Taking a fresh and dynamic approach to fine art, Dave White has developed a signature style that has made him one of the most recognised artists in contemporary British art.

For a limited time only, we’re offering 25% off Dave White prints, including framed pieces. This offer ends on 30th September 2024, so secure your Dave White piece now!

settings.category_form_description:
Speak with one of our art consultants today—we're more than happy to discuss any queries or questions you may have.

Submit the webform to receive a follow-up from an art consultant as soon as possible.
